title: PyCon US: Simon Willison on Hacking LLMs for Fun and Profit
author: Joab Jackson
description: Prompt engineering is a big bag of dumb tricks, argued the co-creator of Django. But that's no reason you can't create interesting apps with the technology .
cntitle: PyCon US：Simon Willison 谈论如何破解 LLM 以获取乐趣和利润
cndescription: Django 的联合创始人认为，提示工程是一大堆愚蠢的技巧。但这并不是你无法使用该技术创建有趣应用程序的理由。
